channel.title: Astrophysics on Baigel Bytes
channel.description: Recent content in Astrophysics on Baigel Bytes

item.title: There is no center of the Universe! (Topics I can't compute - part 2)
item.description: This is part 2 in the series, Topics I can’t compute. As the name sugguests this series deals with topics I either partially or completely don’t understand or that are so mind blowing that I find them hard to wrap my head around. Hopefully your brains don’t get completely fried XD. Enjoy :) Are you ready to have your mind blown? Our entire universe could be the 3 dimensional surface of a four dimensional hypersphere!
